name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Flame's Story
storyline: The main character's life tragically changes after he crashes into a police sheriff's car. Trying to adjust, Flame sets off a series of unpleasant events: he owes everyone money, gypsies are looking for him, and strangest of all: the San Andreas myths turn out to be real and start haunting him.
summary: Flame's Story — a hardcore story mod for GTA: SA with 100 hours of gameplay, where you'll be in the shoes of a man who's always out of money, many debts, but a great appetite for food!
